body:
Looks like this will need to change:

https://github.com/spack/spack/blob/a5440305173c218ec785b0d5a2dfa8b02bb0b731/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/trilinos/package.py#L462

To avoid this:

```
1 error found in build log:
  >> 3    CMake Error at CMakeLists.txt:95 (MESSAGE):
     4      CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD=11 is not in the allowed set (14|17|20)
```
title: Trilinos now requires c++14 and cmake 3.17
